name: Residential Brokerage
description: Companies that facilitate buying, selling, and renting of residential properties, including single-family homes, apartments, and condominiums.

name: Commercial Brokerage
description: Firms that specialize in buying, selling, and leasing of commercial properties, including office buildings, retail spaces, and industrial facilities.

name: Property Management
description: Companies that oversee the daily operations of residential and commercial properties, including rent collection, maintenance, and tenant relations.

name: Real Estate Development
description: Companies that acquire land, design, construct, and market new properties, including residential subdivisions, commercial complexes, and mixed-use developments.

name: Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs)
description: Companies that own and operate income-generating properties, providing investors with a way to invest in real estate without directly managing properties.

name: Real Estate Technology (Proptech)
description: Companies that develop and provide technology solutions for the real estate industry, including property listing platforms, virtual tours, and transaction management tools.

name: Mortgage Banking
description: Institutions that originate, sell, and service mortgage loans, providing financing options for property buyers and owners.

name: Title Insurance and Settlement Services
description: Companies that provide title insurance, escrow services, and settlement solutions to facilitate smooth property transactions.

name: Appraisal and Valuation Services
description: Firms that provide independent property appraisals and valuations, helping lenders, investors, and property owners determine property values.

name: Real Estate Consulting
description: Companies that offer strategic advisory services to real estate investors, developers, and operators, providing market research, feasibility studies, and operational guidance.

name: Property Auction Services
description: Companies that facilitate the sale of properties through auction processes, often for distressed or foreclosed properties.

name: Real Estate Education and Training
description: Organizations that provide educational programs, certifications, and training for real estate professionals, including agents, brokers, and property managers.
